    public class CodeNarcReportGenerator
extends Object

        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        sink - The sink to generate the report.
        bundle - The resource bundle to get the messages from.
        basedir - The project base directory.
        siteTool - Doxia SiteTool Handle.
